SEARCH
Package com.example.app.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.controller.UserController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="*") @Validated public class UserController extends Object
Controller class that handles HTTP requests related to user management.

    • getUsers

      @GetMapping(path="/users") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserProfileDTO>> getUsers(@RequestParam Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") Integer pageSize, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a page of user profiles.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the authenticated user
      Returns:
      a response entity containing the page of user profiles if successful, or an error response with the appropriate HTTP status

    • getUser

      @GetMapping(path="/users/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserProfileDTO> getUser(@PathVariable("id") String handle, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a user profile by handle.
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the user
      user - the authenticated user
      Returns:
      a response entity containing the user profile if found, or an error response with the appropriate HTTP status

    • updateUser

      @PatchMapping(path="/users/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> updateUser(@PathVariable("id") String handle, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UserProfileDTO userProfileDTO, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Updates a user profile.
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the user
      userProfileDTO - the updated user profile DTO
      user - the authenticated user
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the status of the user profile update

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping(path="/users/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") String handle, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)

      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the user
      user - the authenticated user
      Returns:

    • getReviews

      Retrieves a page of reviews for a user.
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the user
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the authenticated user
      Returns:
      a response entity containing the page of reviews if successful, or an error response with the appropriate HTTP status

      Parameters:

      user - the authenticated user
